snippet: China's sweeping overhaul of its anti-corruption architecture could enable President Xi Jinping to justify retaining his key ally and top graft buster Wang Qishan beyond retirement age, sources with ties to the leadership say....

headline.main: All 36 Victims of Ghost Ship Fire Died From Smoke Inhalation
headline.print_headline: All 36 Victims of Ghost Ship Fire Died From Smoke Inhalation

lead_paragraph: China's sweeping overhaul of its anti-corruption architecture could enable President Xi Jinping to justify retaining his key ally and top graft buster Wang Qishan beyond retirement age, sources with ties to the leadership say.
